member.name: T:ExtensionLib.ByteOrder
member.summary: Specifies in which order bytes are handled.

member.name: F:ExtensionLib.ByteOrder.LittleEndian
member.summary: The least significant byte (lowest address) is stored first.

member.name: F:ExtensionLib.ByteOrder.BigEndian
member.summary: The most significant byte (highest address) is stored first.

member.name: T:ExtensionLib.SocketMethods
member.summary: Provides various socket-related static extension methods.

member.name: M:ExtensionLib.SocketMethods.SetKeepAlive(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Boolean,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the options of a socket.
member.param: The socket to modify.
The state of the keep-alive operating mode.
The duration to wait, in milliseconds, before the connection times out.
The interval to wait, in milliseconds, between keep-alive failures.

member.name: M:ExtensionLib.SocketMethods.IsAlive(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether a socket is available for reading.
member.param: The socket to poll.
The time to wait for a response, in microseconds.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating whether the socket has replied.

member.name: T:ExtensionLib.StringArrayConverter
member.summary: Provides a type converter to convert a string of character-separated values to and from an array of strings.

member.name: M:ExtensionLib.StringArrayConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ExtensionLib.StringArrayConverter.CanConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether this converter can convert a given source type to the native type of the converter.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating whether this type can be converted to a array.
member.param: An object that provides a format context.
The source to test.

member.name: M:ExtensionLib.StringArrayConverter.ConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object)
member.summary: Converts the specified object to a array, using the specified context and culture information.
member.returns: An that represents the converted value.
member.param: An that provides a format context.
The to use as the current culture.
The to convert.
